DocAttribute.Name: Suppliers
DocAttribute.Documentation: Possible suppliers of the type of materials.

DocAttribute.Name: UsageRatio
DocAttribute.Documentation: The ratio of the amount of a construction material used to the amount provided (determined as a quantity)

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: There should only be a single relationship, assigning products to the material resource.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If a reference to a resource is given, then through the IfcRelAssignsToResource relationship with the RelatedObjectType PRODUCT.
